column5: Ladies and gentalmen, that man is my hero. I hope I have half his wit at his age.  Thanks for sharing the video!!
That is awesome ..love to fish/ spend a day with that ole chap
Sweet, I wonder if Bob will be doing a show with him shortly
Great video, .... the stories he could tell  totaly agree with the pickled pike, had some , and it's great
I reckon I know a guy who could build one of those rigs!  What a hoot!  Hello "Fisherman" are you there?  Doug
Hahahaha, ya Bob Izumi beat me to it, but his costs $40K. Sno Bear
Unreal,what a witty man.Really enjoyed the video.
What some people will do for pickled pike!
That was a great watch.  Thanks for sharing.
You have to love it he saw a problem and came up with a solution! Awesome can crusher too.
You have to love it he saw a problem and came up with a solution! Awesome can crusher too. Yes that was a good show.  some see problems, some see solutions.  that I say with a broken sled
Awesome!  Thanx for posting.  That man is a genius!  At 77 years old - I hope to be able to get outta the rocking chair!
